text:
<@UFCK510Q6> - Some good details here: <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/articles/kcs_article/cms-general/get-started-with-landing-pages-and-website-pages>

 you can also search the <http://academy.HubSpot.com|academy.HubSpot.com> and <http://knowledge.HubSpot.com|knowledge.HubSpot.com>
You can also check out lessons 7 and 8 in the HubSpot Marketing Certification: <https://academy.HubSpot.com/courses/HubSpot-marketing-software>

Generally speaking - templates CAN be used across any type of page (landing or page), however, Landing Page templates are often simpler and focused around a single offer/conversion event. So your template will reflect that

hey guys! thank you so much on your replies it means a lot! i'm currently letting my superiors know all these so that i can be particular on what to focused on first and have better ways to collaborate

yeah im also considering some of my reasons for interchanging use of templates, sometimes, it's as shallow as 'oh that template is pretty, i wanna use it" but base on what u said, that's good to know!
